pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Topics and Sim tabs

content.raw:
I'm not sure who's part this falls into (Ian?), but dropping a variable on the canvas below the XY fields should create the plot and add that variable to the y-axis (dropping the variable into a field also works, as shown here).

Just wanted to make sure that interaction isn't forgotten :)
content.html:
I'm not sure who's part this falls into (Ian?), but dropping a variable on the canvas below the XY fields should create the plot and add that variable to the y-axis (dropping the variable into a field also works, as shown here).

Just wanted to make sure that interaction isn't forgotten :)
